trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>事件發生於表單關閉時，可能是由使用者透過使用者介面 (UI)，或以程式設計的方式，透過方法呼叫這類之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
